params.index: The index of the archaeologist's accused sarcophagi

returns._0: the identifier associated with the index of the archaeologist's accused sarcophagi

params.index: The index of the archaeologist's cleaned-up sarcophagi

returns._0: the identifier associated with the index of the archaeologist's cleaned-up sarcophagi

params.index: The index of the archaeologist's unwrapped sarcophagi

returns._0: the identifier associated with the index of the archaeologist's unwrapped sarcophagi

params.archaeologist: The address of the archaeologist whose accusations count is being returned
The address of the archaeologist whose cleanups count is being returned

params.index: The index of the registered archaeologist

params.archaeologist: The address of the archaeologist whose sarcophagi are being returned

params.sarcoId: the sarcophagus to check if unwrapping occured

params.archaeologist: The address of the archaeologist whose success
The address of the archaeologist whose cursed bond is being returned

params.embalmer: The address of the embalmer whose sarcophagi are being returned

params.archaeologist: The address of the archaeologist whose free bond is being returned

returns._0: The protocol fee base percentage - protocolFeeBasePercentage

params.recipient: The address of the recipient whose sarcophagi are being returned

params.archaeologist: The address of the archaeologist whose reward is being returned

params.sarcoId: The identifier of the sarcophagus being returned

params.archaeologist: The address of the archaeologist whose data is being returned
params.sarcoId: The identifier of the sarcophagus whose data is being returned

archaeologistAccusalsIdentifier(address,.notice: Returns the sarcophagus unique identifier for a given archaeologist and index of the accused sarcophagi

archaeologistCleanupsIdentifier(address,.notice: Returns the sarcophagus unique identifier for a given archaeologist and index of the cleaned-up sarcophagi

archaeologistSuccessesIdentifier(address.notice: Returns the sarcophagus unique identifier for a given archaeologist and index of the successfully unwrapped sarcophagi

getArchaeologistAccusalsCount(address).notice: Returns the number of accusations for an archaeologist.

getArchaeologistCleanupsCount(address).notice: Returns the number of cleanups for an archaeologist.

getArchaeologistProfile(address).notice: Given an archaeologist address, return that archaeologist's profile

getArchaeologistProfileAddressAtIndex(ui.notice: Given an index (of the full archaeologist array), return the archaeologist address at that index

getArchaeologistProfileAddresses().notice: Return the list of registereed archaeologist addresses.

getArchaeologistProfiles(address[]).notice: Gets archaeologist profiles given a list of archaeologist addresses. If an invalid address is included, simply leaves it out of the list.

getArchaeologistSarcophagi(address).notice: Given an archaeologist's address, returns the identifiers of all sarcophagi that the archaeologist has participated in.

getArchaeologistSuccessOnSarcophagus(add.notice: Returns whether an archaeologist completed an unwrap for a sarcophagus

getArchaeologistSuccessesCount(address).notice: Returns the number of successful unwraps for an archaeologist.

getArchaeologistsStatistics(address[]).notice: Gets all reputation statistics for each archaeologist Contains a list of counts for each category.

getCursedBond(address).notice: Returns the amount of cursed bond stored in the contract for an archaeologist.

getEmbalmerSarcophagi(address).notice: Given an embalmer's address, returns the identifiers of all sarcophagi that the embalmer has created.

getExpirationThreshold().notice: Gets the expiration threshold after which a sarcophagus must be renegotiated

getFreeBond(address).notice: Returns the amount of free bond stored in the contract for an archaeologist.

getGracePeriod().notice: Gets the grace period an archaeologist is given to resurrect a sarcophagus after the resurrection time passes

getProtocolFeeBasePercentage().notice: Get the protocol fee base percentage from the contract.

getRecipientSarcophagi(address).notice: Given a recipient's address, returns the identifiers of all sarcophagi that the recipient has participated in.

getRewards(address).notice: Returns the amount of rewards stored in the contract for an archaeologist.

getSarcophagusArchaeologist(bytes32,addr.notice: Returns the data stored on a sarcophagus for an archaeologist.

getTotalProtocolFees().notice: Gets the total protocol fees from the contract.
